exploits.title: Reentrancy Attack on Yield Protocol
exploits.description: Attacker exploited reentrancy vulnerability in yield farming contract to drain liquidity pool.

technical_details.attack_vector: External contract call during state update
technical_details.root_cause: Missing reentrancy guard on external call

exploits.title: Oracle Price Manipulation via Flash Loans
exploits.description: Flash loan attack manipulated oracle prices to liquidate undercollateralized positions.

technical_details.root_cause: Oracle price manipulation through large temporary positions

moderation_queue.title: Potential Reentrancy Attack on Lending Protocol
moderation_queue.content: Attacker exploited reentrancy vulnerability by calling withdraw function recursively...
